tool_description: Creates 3D models based on concept specifications with proper geometry, UVs, and export formats for game engines.

concept_id.description: Reference ID from Asset Concept Generator

mesh_quality.description: Quality level: draft, standard, high, production

uv_unwrap.description: Whether to generate UV coordinates for texturing

export_formats.description: Output file formats: fbx, obj, dae, gltf, blend

detail_level.description: Level of geometric detail: low, medium, high, ultra

error_messages: Concept ID not found: Provide a valid concept_id from Asset Concept Generator
Invalid mesh quality: Use one of [draft, standard, high, production]
Invalid export format: Supported formats are [fbx, obj, dae, gltf, blend]
Scale factor out of range: Must be between 0.1 and 10.0
Invalid detail level: Use one of [low, medium, high, ultra]
usage: Provide a concept_id from Asset Concept Generator. Adjust mesh_quality, detail_level, and export_formats based on project needs. The tool creates 3D geometry ready for texturing and animation.

model_id.description: Unique identifier for the created 3D model

vertex_count.description: Total number of vertices in the model

polygon_count.description: Total number of polygons/faces in the model

file_paths.description: Array of file paths for exported model formats

bounding_box.description: Six values representing min/max X,Y,Z coordinates

uv_islands.description: Number of UV mapping islands created
